summary: This "story of a ship", the British destroyer H.M.S. Torrin, is told in flashbacks by survivors as they cling to a life raft.
cast: Noël Coward|John Mills|Bernard Miles|Celia Johnson|Kay Walsh|Joyce Carey|Derek Elphinstone|Michael Wilding|Robert Sansom|Philip Friend|Chimmo Branson|Ballard Berkeley|Hubert Gregg|James Donald|Michael Whittaker|Kenneth Carten|John Varley|Caven Watson|Geoffrey Hibbert|Frederick Piper|Lionel Grose|Leslie Dwyer|Charles Russell|John Singer|Robert Moreton|John Boxer|Kenneth Evans|Johnnie Schofield|Franklyn Bennett|Charles Compton|Walter Fitzgerald|Gerald Case|Daniel Massey|Ann Stephens|Kathleen Harrison|Dora Gregory|Penelope Dudley-Ward|Barbara Waring|Eileen Peel|Lesley Osmond|Josie Welford|Kay Young|Trixy Scales|George Carney|Wally Patch|Michael Anderson|Jill Stephens|Everley Gregg|Roddy Hughes|Norman Pierce|Juliet Mills|Neville Chamberlain|Richard Attenborough|John Brabourne|Robin Burns|Jeremy Hawk|Adolf Hitler|Leslie Howard
director: Directors: Noël Coward (as Noel Coward), David Lean
title: Sangre, sudor y lágrimas
